name: A Witchef's Story
description:
You are an adorable little witch who just arrived to a new town, ready to settle down. There you ask people in town what they need help and to your surprise their answer is: "A chef!".

Now you'll have to learn to cook without giving up your path in witchcraft and what a better way than bringing to life the recipes and use them to fight and get new ingredients. 

Pick your best "food" and get ready to have the cutest fights to fill the empty stomachs of people!
